'''Radiant Spincrystal 143''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Soothing of Soul and Sand]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located in the [["Masters of the Night-Wind"]]'s Tribe.
